values:
Pretender
Drama Queen
Oscar Worthy
What a performance!
Just keep smiling
Just keep breathing
Don't scream, Don't cry
Don't let it out, Don't suffocate
On a life that is so distant from that which I wanted
That which I dreamed
Everything is hanging like a carrot
So close and yet so far away
My dreams mock me while they drift further out of view
My light, my light, what happened to my light?
What happened to this feeling of optimism?
I tried so hard to convince it was all going to be alright
Run 
Home
Run
Into a room with 4 walls and safety
Comfort
Familiarity
Look through boxes and imagine I'm 16 again
Create a new light
Create a new dream
Try not to let the scars stop me from believing again
In love
In life
In me....
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/70102.html

Want you to make me feel like I'm the only girl in the world
Want you to make me believe that I'm the only girl you're dreaming of
Want so hard to believe that this is going places
Instead of round in circles, smack bang into a brick wall
Want you to make me feel like I'm that person worth dying for
Want you to make me believe that I'm the one you adore
Adore me, Love me, Never ever leave me
Hold me, Kiss me, Never ever cause me pain
So why can't you recognise i'm sinking?
Why have you stuck you're head in the ground once more?
I'm drowning in the reality I tried to run away from
I ran so hard, I ran so fast, I found my smile
And now? It's gone, and is it worth it?
Is this feeling worth it?
So many questions, answers not so forthcoming
So I ask you the questions and mute you remain
Rely on me, let me in, don't push me away I hear you cry
Why? You don't have the answers, you don't have the cure
You have no forthcoming solutions to these problems
A problem shared, is a problem halved...
No it's not, it's doubled.
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/69705.html

I love you dearly, love you wholeheartedly
But sometimes hestitate when faced with such aggression
So snappy, so blatant, so arrogant in nature
Not everyone is as clever as you
Not everyone wants to start an argument or fight
The venom, the spite, the anger you possess
Is terrifying, alarming and ever so concerning
I stand only to make the pain go away
To make you feel at ease to feel emotion 
To feel content just being you, you don't have to try
What are you trying to prove? 
Why do you always feel the need to make judgement?
Never listen patiently and tolerantly
Not everyone wants to hurt you, why the high alert?
Just kill time, just smile and laugh and converse
Don't fight, and snap and stand to attention
It's just a conversation, it's not a threat or attack
Please just let it go, this anger, this frustration, 
This general air of contempt suffocating you 
Please... just breathe :)
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/69361.html

Lets get one thing straight shall we
I am not a half, I am a whole
I am not your shadow, I am my own light
I do not need you to hold me this tightly
I'm not going anywhere, I'm not moving even slightly
Why are you suddenly so insecure
I am loving you so purely and sincerly
Why are you working against me in this?
Why are you moving to cut me off?
I love you wholeheartedly, beautifully innocent
I said I wanted to spend the rest of my life with you
I spoke the truth
Why let these past demons destroy what we have?
Why is she always gonna be the reason why there's an edge?
The more you pull at me, and try to control me
The more the independence tugs,
The more I start to feel my fears emerge
Please, my darling, have some faith
Understand that I have given my all to you
But that does not give you the right
It never will
To dictate my moves, my roads and my decisions
My friends, my allies, my battles and my life
Do not underestimate my desire for independence
My tunnel vision for my hopes and dreams... and you
You are my one, true, everything
I have ever wanted or desired
Please have a little faith and understand
I sometimes need my space, my own counsel and laughter
But that does not make you any less a part of it
I am with you, every hour, every minute, every second
Of every day
Hopelessly loving you for all I am worth
I will never faulter if you keep believing
My darling, My lover, My one and only
.... I wish you were here right now.
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/69009.html

Nothing, Nothing, Nothing,
It was all worth NOTHING
Those hours wasted staring at books
And yet I'm still writing essays
I'm still paying costs
I'm in a mountain of debt
Nothing, Nothing, Nothing,
No-one takes me seriously
Pat me on the head and tell me take my place
'You're not alone'
Yes I fucking am
I was promised the world would be my oyster
I was told I was going to be whatever I wanted
That I had worked hard enough to achieve my goals
I was lied to, deceived, oh so tricked!
Read through these lines
Pages and pages of 'Is this all going to be worth it'
No, sweet child, sweet naive little girl, it's not
Angry?
You have no idea
My blood is boiling
My head is pounding
My chest feels as if it could explode
I'd scream if it weren't so melodramatic
I'd cry if I thought that I could stop if I started
Hold it all in, bottling is what you do best
Don't tell me to let it out, it won't stop coming
Don't tell me it's all alright, just for tonight it's not all OK
It's not gonna get better, because it's just been getting worse
I don't need you to tell me it's their loss, because it's mine, 
Just let me mourn, have one moment of pure self pity
But please stop tucking at my cork...It's the only thing holding me together
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/68817.html

I'm trying so hard and it's getting rather tiresome
Every little rejection another little reminder, it's not working
I'm forcing a smile and painting on optimism every morning
Wonder if any of them notice, it's getting rather tiresome
This mask is wearing thin, tears burning through
I'm trying so hard and it's not developing into anything
Fuck your meritocracy
Fuck your lines of 'it'll all work out in the end'
'Don't let it get to you, It's all just sent to try you'
6 months I've been trying to be the perfect candidate
Too qualified, Not enough life experience, Too much passion, Not likely to conform....
What are you after exactly? I meet your fucked up little specifications everytime.... I've worked too hard to be told I'm not working enough...
So what am I supposed to do now? Stand in the dole line like some leeching zombie?
Tell me now what do you expect me to do? Get back up battered and bruised?
I'm bleeding, it's pathetic, I'm fine, I'm fine.... I'm not and I know it
Even you know it
Damn it I wish you didn't know me this well
You know me so well that I know it's going to hurt
I could scream down this place, I could tear some people apart, 
I would cry... except I have no more tears left, my eyes are empty, 
I remember the days when I actually believed I could change the world
When my eyes would burn at the thought of achieving my goals and dreams
Now they lie in tatters, half the woman I wanted to be, soon you'll realise that and leave
I can't keep doing this to myself, how much further is life gonna push me?
Isn't it my time for some decent weather, some decent shot?
Where they aren't playing favourites or making me jump through hoops?
I'm smacking my head against a brick wall, I'm suffocating on my own anger
Give me something, anything to break as much as my heart has done already
Give me some piece of hope that I can be the woman you fell in love with
The woman I wanted to be, the woman I thought I was capable of becoming, 

How much more of this am I expected to take?
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/68401.html

I'm not running anymore, I'm staying put
I'm not so scared anymore, I'm fighting fit
I'm not thinking and fretting, not feeling so deprived
I'm not wanting to break out and find something more
I'm content, I'm so happy I can't hide this smile
It's not false anymore, the laughter, the light
I don't wanna run away anymore, I want to stay
Right here in these arms and never let you go
Whatever was broken has healed
Whatever was bleeding is now a scar
Whatever hurt I was feeling, evaporated with one girlish giggle
What have you done to me? Do it again I beg of you
Suddenly I'm safe to smile, 
Safe to open without fear of consequence
Touch me again, I beg of you
Carry on making me feel this protected
My darling, My angel, My beau.... I have fallen so fast :)
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/68266.html

If I could I would run away and forget this losing fight
Constantly feeling sickness without any cure in sight
If I could I would break you just like you have done me
I'm trying to gain my self control and finally be free
If I could I would turn away and never look back
Forget about battles and planning a counter-attack
If I could I would leave tonight and find my feet
Forget about the lies, the pain and the unforgivable deceit
If I could I would show you just what damage has been done
Open my heart and show just how bitter is has become
If I could I would turn off these tears and walk away
Believe myself when I say I'll live to fight another day
But I find my feet stuck firmly to this floor
I'm fighting without reason, forgotten what for
I find that I am lost in a room that is my own
In a city full of people and yet so very alone
I am hopelessly addicted to a cause that bears no meaning
I am so fed up of sleepless nights and continual screaming
Dark circles for eyes, gone too my once burning light
Tired and depressed with no hope of sleeping tonight
Tell myself this is worth something, something so true
Find myself unconvincing when face to face with you

One day this suffering will be worth something, kid.
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/68061.html

Close my eyes and listen to lyrics so true
In my little world of safety where there is no you
Close my eyes and forget I believed you true
It's time to leave, wake up, we're through

I'm stronger than even I believed
I may be hurt, naive and deceived
I'm up, I'm running, I'm leaving tonight
Patch up my broken wings and taking flight
I'm dreaming, thinking, breathing and living
Maybe one day i'll find myself forgiving
I'm leaving my heartbreak, my pain and my sorrow
Focusing on my hopeful tommorrow
Where you'll never see these tears again
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/67799.html

You with your wisdom and words thinking that you are so wordly
You try so hard to cut me down in my aspirations and dreams
You try to make me feel so grateful that you would deem me worthy
You try with every word to make me feel a fake in this uniform
I ran away today, as fast as I could, jumped on a train to head for safety
Straight to my fortified walls so you couldn't take my last piece of faith
The last bit of light in my eyes and hope in my heart that I was enough
That I could prove them wrong in my continued devotion and dedication
I am not just a pretty piece of skirt, I am a force to be reckoned with
I have stood in the line of fire, ever faithful to a cause and community
I followed you into danger, a naive shadow that never faultered to defend you
I took the abuse, bruises both inside and out, never questionning their worth
I loved the blue lights, the blue drama so unrequitedly and innocently
I never took a second to question their motives, I just felt the knives
I know now that I am too young to resign myself to this culture of cyncism
How can people given such power be so hateful and spiteful? Even to their own?

I refuse to give it to your betrayel
I refuse to give you the satisfaction of tears
I will continue fighting and bleeding until I have proved you all wrong
And believe me, I shall
You will see
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/67380.html

Maybe one day history will repeat itself
The heart will never forget every wound
Everytime your words pierced the softer surface
I'm not so bullet proof like I'd have you believe
I'm not so confident like I'd have you believe
I get hurt like everyone else
I've got the issues and regrets too
I've got the type of hidden flaws
Just like you

Maybe one day your glance will satisfy
This smile just one day might be accepting
Every night tears on my pillow after one kiss
I'm not so plastic like I'd have you believe
Sticks and stones can break my bones
But names cut much deeper
But I've got the desire and will too
And I've got the tune with the voice
Just like you
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/67084.html

Been here before
The echo of tears and grief
The reminder of the pain
I'm forced to deal with these demons now
I don't like this
I hate this
I can feel the scream rising in my throat
I can feel the tears burning my eyes
Why again
Why like this
All over again
He's knocking on heaven's door
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/67014.html

12 hours since I last saw your face
It's been 12 hours since our last kiss
It'll be another 12 until I feel you again
It's been too long since I felt like this
Too long ago to remember the song and how it goes
Falling too fast in love and afraid that is shows
My blushed up cheeks and buckled knees
My heart pumping trying to fight this disease
But let me wrap myself under your cover at night
Let me forget about the battle I'm having to fight
It's just you and me
Just you and me
My darling, My lover, My baby
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/66603.html

I never thought
Never imagined
He's my brother
He's my blood
It's in their blood
The cheating 
The lying
The incomprehensible 
And it hurts to know
They think the same way
Act the same way
Hurt the same way
And don't care
All in the same way
The jack the lad
The stud in the making
You think you've won so much praise
But you've never lost so much respect
I looked up to you
Believed in you
As a brother
As a husband
As a father
And now?
Shattered
Long gone is the illusion that a man
Could be
May be
Flawless and true

I hope you're proud when you see your sister's tears

Something so precious
Something we used to hold in such high esteem
Something we treasured
Cast aside
You hypocrite
You liar and fake
We're not praising
Far from it
We're not congratulating
We're mourning
The loss of our dreamer
The loss of our romancer
The loss of everything we had faith in
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/66086.html

It's amazing the transformation
One day girl with confidence
The next the girl with none
One day the girl so popular with her peers
The next the girl left deserted on her own
Sitting wrapped under the duvet
Staring out of the window 
Raindrops falling down
I hear every drop, every thud
It echoes inside this hollow space 
Empty, Void, Abandoned
Close my eyes to sleep and find I cannot
Open my mouth to sing and find myself mute
Grasp at the pen and find my hand not so agreeing
Read through the books and find no knowledge to my liking
No face to my liking
No taste to my liking
Difficult
Dis-satisfied
........ Depressed.
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/65813.html

Wondering if this is what I really want
If this is really where I wanna be
Is this the place I wanna stand
Is this person I've become really me
Is every second worth it
Is every moment what I need
If I could have my time once more
Would this place be worth the bleed
Imagining if every dream came true
If I'd done what my heart desired
If I'd never let the sense cut in
Would I be so sick and tired?
Or maybe every precious moment
And every moment yet to come
Is the recognition of all my sacrifices
Of the place that I am from
Maybe every precious good time
And every good time that lays in waiting
Will bring about the joy and tears
The excitment and elating
So maybe I should wonder more
And smile at the truth of it all
See my future bright and clearly now
And stand up strong and tall.
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/65696.html

A soft sweet melody
Candlelight floods the floor
A single finger runs down my spine
I am lost, I am hopelessly in love
His breath against my cheek
A moment like no other
A tear that stains both our faces
Breaking every inhibition
Every doubt and fear released
And every hope and dream embraced
Staring like there's no tommorrow
Experiencing every second like it's our last
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/65521.html

I'll promise you eternity when here
I'll promise you the world when in these arms
I'll promise you my soul till the day I die
I'll take a vow so true you won't believe
I'll hold you tighter than you've even known
I'll be the one that takes away your fears
I'll hold you hand and kiss you lips
And i'll be with you forever more
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/65268.html

I'm trapped
Under the deadlines
Under the books
Under the pressure
That I just can't cope with
Welcome back to hell
A place I'd flown from long ago
How I wish to fly once more
Break free from every burden
Every task still yet to do
Every nagging thought in my mind
And every doubt that I hold so dear
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/64951.html

It's proof of everything I feel
It's proof of my sacrifice, my love
It represents my strength and courage
It represents my journey and passion
My trophy
My souvenir
My jade
And it was lying on your floor
Under discarded tissues and ticket subs
It was lying so un-lovingly 
Caste aside and left to break
Once round your neck now lost to you
Nothing to you
Just to take for granted
I snatched it back
Fumbled it into my pocket
You'll not notice it's gone
It's meaning bears no meaning to you
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/64596.html

Sit and look at the stars
Peer out the window
Still blinded by every adoring stare
Still wrapped in my own little world
His own little words
Every little thing
Day dreaming through the lectures
Walking on air 
When my feet should stay firmly grounded
But I smile knowing what matters
Knowing what doesn't
Knowing the only thing I need
Is standing right in front of me
He has been for years
He will be for years to come
:)
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/64416.html

Honesty was always my best policy
My best feature
The best I had to offer
And you take every word
No matter what
No matter how cold or how sharp
You accept every flaw
Every tiny blemish or imperfection
You see them oh so clearly
And yet still love despite
And it sings so sweet to me
Like a guitar string melody
You're eyes so pure and true
So trusting
So loving
Adoring morning, noon and night
Contemplating past, present and future
I am with you my darling
I am with you every second in every way
Like some guitar string melody my love
That will haunt us everyday
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/64201.html

Leave me with my baby
And I'll be fine
Leave me with my sweetheart
And I'll beam forever more
Stop trying to make me doubt this
Leave me with my baby
And I'll be the daughter you want
I'll get those grades
And I'll get some career
Something that'll make you proud
But don't try and separate me from my baby
From my everything
Who cares if it's not logical, rational
Who are you to try and stop me flowing
Stop me loving 
Stop me from making my own mistakes
My own triumphs
Leave me with my baby
Forever more

See me
Seeing you
Seeing the situation we're in right now
Don't make too much sense
Does it?
Do we?
No note
No phonecall
No word of thanks or love
Am I little too intense to begin doubting?
But it kinda gets to me
You've changed
And you promised you never would.
That sparkle in your eye so vacant
And it breaks my heart a little
Wrapped up in your own little world
With melodrama and excitement
I'm not contained in it
And it breaks my faith a little
Drifting
And you promised you never would.

Natural flare
Natural energy
My natural spark
My natural addiction
My natural passion
My life
My air
My purpose and cause
Hear the sound of applause
Hit the lights and key the music
Tune everything so perfectly
A spot light awaits
But it's not the one I choose
A audience to judge me
But it's not the one I intended
A stage for me to impress
But it's not the one I love
It never was the one I love
And it never will be

Don't recognise your smile
Your laugh
Your grip
The way you smirk
The light in your eyes all gone
You've got me all wrong
You never had me all right
All shattered
Put on a brave face
Keep on doing what I do
But you don't know me
You never knew me
You think you know me
You think you know me
But you don't
You never did
Never Ever did
Now all that's left are pieces of a dream
An illusion
Laid out in pieces around me
And now I suddenly can't breath
Dizzy
Ditzy
Faint

Down by the cliff edge

Lets just hold on to each other and hope it's forever
Lets just not let sense cut in
Not this time
It's just you and I
And it always will be.

Damn

You Are 50% Boyish and 50% Girlish
You are pretty evenly split down the middle - a total eunuch. Okay, kidding about the eunuch part. But you do get along with both sexes. You reject traditional gender roles. However, you don't actively fight them. You're just you. You don't try to be what people expect you to be.
How Boyish or Girlish Are You?

Silence
The best form of response
The only form of response you know
Sitting in your back seat
Crying in your back seat
10 years, 10 years of our lives
And silence is how you repay me
Swallow your pride
Get down off that pedalstool
Find you cannot
And it hurts me more than you'll ever know
And it pains me more than you'll ever care
To know, To know
I'll never hear the words "I love you"
To know there will never be a sincere word 
Formed in that mouth and heart of yours
Your walls remain solid, no bridge or hole for me
No space in your closed space for a friend
A friend that adores you
So true and so beautifully
10 years, 10 years of my life
And still no gratitude
Hypocritical words you sing out
"Be strong and learn to say the words I love you"
Find you cannot
And never will.
http://nia-rose.livejournal.com/62124.html

Spiteful tongue
Whip and Spin out nasty tones
Nasty clauses so full of pain
Spiteful tongue
With no such love or no such cause
You find no faith in womankind tonight
Your desperation to feel a woman's warmth
Still lingers on inside your soul
Deny it, I laugh, I pull at your arm
Tug at your bottom lip and you...
Cannot speak
Spiteful tongue
Truth has been spoken
Can'st thou lie and be spiteful once more
Find you cannot
Truth has been spoken
And you have been touched
By the love of a woman
By the warmth of a woman
By the wanting gaze of a woman
And thus the spiteful tongue doth die
And with it all your damned illusions
Of what's it's like to be a with a woman
To be touched by a woman
And to be loved and adored by a woman.

I'll rip you limb from limb
I'll tear out ur eyes and stratch at ur face

How dare you

How dare you pain such a beautiful man

Just one more word to write on this essay
Just one more page to read in this book
Just one more little doodle on the back of my hand
Just one more little breath and I'll be done
But I won't
I can't
The classic clash of wanting and doing
The oh so ironic incident of having the determination
But losing the motivation
Tiny little letters
So that's what my life has succumb to
Tiny little A's
Tiny little B's
God forbid tiny little C's
But my perspective has switched
At not so perfect timing
I don't just see the tunnell
I see the landscape, the world as my oyster
Something to live for, to die for
I refuse to be kept in this academic prison forever
To slave over books, To cry over the pressure and expectation
I deserve more than this
I want so much more than this
I need to travel the world, To write and sing
To act on a million stages, To get the passion back in my eyes
To dance with my love and to appreciate the little things
The little things we so often take for granted
I want to break out of this cycle, to run to safety and warmth
I detest these words of "sense" and "proper"
How I loath these four walls that make up my nightmare
Just one more word to write on this essay
Just one more page to read in this book
Just one more little doodle on the back of my hand
Just one more little breath and I'll be done.... and free.

words that cannot speak,
that is how i would describe us,
fearless, nameless compatibility,
we dont need words, 
just a look states the mood,

however could i love someone so equally

Back from your honeymoon period
Back from everything you crave and want in life
Back and shot back down to reality

Always remember

We'll get there together
Forever

Learn to tell a tale

Can stand in front of a million
And share what you learnt and knew

Can't share the feeling in your heart
Be strong and learn to say the words I love you

Be strong and take my hand
And I will never fail you

"The more I wait, it seems the more I hate this town for what it's doing to me"
I hate the expectations
I hate the way I'm supposed to get it right
I hate the way I'm supposed to be all motivated and determined
When I'm just not
I couldn't care less
Just couldn't care less
What a highly ironic time to be having such doubts and thoughts
Useless brain
With useless knowledge
Half of which will lead to useless rambles
Like this...
Just like this

I'm not scared
But I can't move
I'm not afraid
But I can't breath
Suffocated by your own wants and desires
Not my own
Slam the brakes on this runaway train
Throw myself towards the nearest exit
But the tears
The tears in your eyes oh so gently slipping down your oh so perfect cheeks
Pause for reflection
Start up the engine again
And pray I find the right station to depart

The harshness I'm thrown upon my self sometimes is too much to take
The criticism that I've given my reflection accusing myself as a fake 
The levels and the targets that I've set myself are sometimes just too high
Those promises that I've made myself just seem to flutter by
I'm sick and tired of trying, I'm sick and tired of proving
I'm sick and tired of staying still, and hardly ever moving
Scared of how the judge will see it, when judged unsuccessfully
But realise now the bitter judge, the one I fear... is me.

How stupid and yet wonderful
Singing so loud everyone can hear
Yes even the boy I swore would never hear a tune
Hear, Listen, why so shy before!
Every note hit
Every note held until I could not breath
Oh how wonderful
How fantastic
This feeling inside
Bursting new lights entwined with excitement
And passion
Oh how wonderful
So unbelievable
I could ever feel like this again

Helpless and I don't like this feeling
